GK16visa03cu:713: yo hi jñāpyo ghaṭādiḥ sannapi kadācidajñāto bhavati,
GK16visa03cu:720: (vi, ḍha) hetuviśeṣakāryatvaṃ rasasya ye vadanti tanmataṃ nirasyati---yasmādeṣa ityādi tasmānna kārya ityantena /
GK16visa03cu:721: ayamarthaḥ ---“prapānakarasanyāyāccarvyamāṇo raso bhavedityuktyā vibhāvādiratyādisamūhālambanātmako rasa ityuktam /
GK16visa03cu:723: kecittu tatsamakālotpannaṃ vyañjanayāpi tādṛśaṃ samūhālambanānantaraṃ jāyate,
GK16visa03cu:728: na samūhālambanakāryaḥ svasya svakāryatvāt svakālotpattikasya vyañjanādhīnasamūhālambanāntarasyābhāvācceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:731: (lo, a) rasasyeti--nahi vibhāvādijñānakāraṇakamityanantaraṃ tataścānupalabhyamānakāraṇāntarasya rasasya na kāryatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:733: yadi rasaḥ kāryaḥ syāttadā vibhāvādijñānakāraṇaka eva syāt /
GK16visa03cu:740: “pratīyamānaḥ prathamaṃ pratyekaṃ heturucyate“ityanena pratyekasya hetutvoktyā tatkāryatve vipratipattyabhāvāt /
GK16visa03cu:745: (vi, ta) nanu tādṛśsamūhātambanakāraṇatve ko doṣaḥ ityāha--tataśceti /
GK16visa03cu:753: (vi, tha) kāraṇajñānasya sthitiḥ kāryajñānasyotpattiriti tu na sambhavatyeva /
GK16visa03cu:775: evaṃ rasasya samūhālambanakāryatvameva khaṇḍitaṃ natu kāryatvam /
GK16visa03cu:781: nanu pūrvasaṃvedanābhāvānnityatvābhāve itaraṣāmapi nityavastūnāmabhāvaprasaṅga ityata āha-asamvetaneti /
GK16visa03cu:785: asaṃvedanakāle hi na bhāvo 'ṣyasya vidyate (ka) // VisSd_3.21 //
GK16visa03cu:796: (lo, i) nāpi bhaviṣyannityāha--sākṣādanubhūyamānasya hi kathaṃ bhaviṣyattm /
GK16visa03cu:797: yasya khalu vastuno bhaviṣyattvaṃ sahajo dharmastat sadā bhaviṣyadeveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:803: (vi, pa) nāpi bhaviṣyanniti yadyapi saṃvedanāt pūrvam asattvenaiva bhaviṣyatvaṃ durapahnavam /
GK16visa03cu:804: tathāpi bhaviṣyatpadārthāntarasya sākṣādānandamayaprakāśatvasvarūpābhāvāt tadvailakṣaṇyameva bhaviṣyatvābhāvaḥ kautukāduktaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:812: yadyapi ghaṭādisādhāraṇajñāpyatvasyaiva samūhālambanakāryatvasyaiva cābhāvaḥ prag darśitaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:819: tat pradhānatvāditi kvacit pāṭhe tatparāmarśaḥ pratyekaṃ taj jñānaṃ,
GK16visa03cu:827: tathā ca na nirvikalpakaṃ niṣprakārakajñānasyaiva tathātvāt /
GK16visa03cu:829: (lo, ī) nirvikalpakaṃ jñānam--asti hmālocanamātraprathamaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ jñānam,
GK16visa03cu:832: sa eva raso nirvikalpakajñānatvena gṛhyamāṇo na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:834: tatra pakṣe yasya grāhakatvamiṣyate ityatra nopacāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:841: yadyapi tadgrāhakasya nirvikalpakatvābhāvayuktipradarśanenaiva savikalpakasaṃvedyatvaṃ siddhaṃ tathāpi savikalpakasaṃvedyāntarato vailakṣaṇyena tadavedyatvaṃ kautukāduktam /
GK16visa03cu:846: pratyuta tasya tatkāvyasya śabdavācyatve svaśabdavācyatvaṃ doṣa eva vakṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:850: savikalpakavedyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ tatkāvyasthaśabdenaiva vācyamiti tato vailakṣaṇyamiti vacanam /
GK16visa03cu:864: sākṣātkārānantaravailakṣaṇyapratipādanāya sākṣātkārarūpasyāpi tatprakāśasya sākṣātkāratvābhāvamapi kautukādāha--nāparokṣa iti /
GK16visa03cu:869: (lo, ṛ) tathābhilāpeti--atrāpi pūrvavat raso na savikalpakarūpa iti /
GK16visa03cu:875: ataḥ paramityatra idamānupūrvoktanirvikalpakaparāmarśaḥ śabdasaṃbhāvta śābdajñānam parokṣamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:877: pūrvaṃ na śruto na dṛṣṭaścoktasvarūpo nirūpaṇaprakāro yasya rasasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:883: (vi, ya) itthaṃ kiñcit vastutaḥ kiñcicca kautukād vailakṣaṇyamuktvā kīdṛśaṃ tādṛśavilakṣaṇaṃ vastu tat iti pṛcchati;
GK16visa03cu:898: tatkiṃ punaḥ pramāṇaṃ tasya sadbhāva ityāha--
GK16visa03cu:899: pramāṇaṃ carvaṇaivātra svābhinne viduṣāṃ matam // VisSd_3.26 //
GK16visa03cu:907: evaṃ ca sahṛdayānubhava evātra pramāṇamiti paryavasyati /
GK16visa03cu:916: lakṣyavyaṅgyavastūnāṃ sambhedāt jñānāt ātmano rasasyānandarūpeṇa samudbhavaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:919: nanu yadi raso na kāryastatkathaṃ mahaṣiṇā(ka)
GK16visa03cu:926: tatastadātmakasya rasasya tatsākṣātkārāṃśamātrajanyatvaṃ siddhāntayituṃ kautukoktamapi tasyākāryatvamuktvā āśaṅkate--nanu yadi raso na kārya iti /
GK16visa03cu:930: itthaṃ vibhāvāditaścarvaṇāyā niṣpattireva vāstavikaratyādyaṃśasya tato niṣpattirupacaritetyuktyā carvaṇāṃśasyāpi niṣpattirupacaritaiveti vaktumāha---yadyapīti /
GK16visa03cu:933: tataśca ratyādirūparasābhinna eva carvaṇātmakaḥ sākṣātkārastathā ratyādeḥ vibhāvādyakāryatayaiva carvaṇasyāpi vibhāvādyakāryatvamarthasiddhamiti yadyapi ratyāderarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:935: tathāpi tasya kādācitkatayā upacaritena kāryatvena kāryatvamupacaryate /
GK16visa03cu:941: kintu vibhāvādijñānettarameva niṣpannetyevaṃ kādācitkatayā upacaritena kāryatvena kāryatvamupacaryate ityartha /
GK16visa03cu:942: nacaivamanyathāsiddhavibhāvādijñānottarabhāvitvena tatkāryatvaṃ carvaṇāyām avāstavameva tat kathamupacāra iti vācyam /
GK16visa03cu:946: (lo, e) yadyapītyādi---ayamarthaḥ samanantaroktaprakāreṇa rasābhinne carvaṇe kādācitkatvād vastuni vyabhicāreṇa tasya kāryatvaṃ kādācitkatvādevopacaryate /
GK16visa03cu:947: tena carvaṇasyāparicitena kāryatvena tadabhinne rasepi kāryatvamupacārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:959: nanu yadi militā ratyādayo rasāstatkathamasya svaprakāśatvaṃ kathaṃ vākhaṇḍatvamityāha--
GK16visa03cu:980: tasya pratimānataḥ satsādṛśyāt ityādyaṃśopi svaprakāśa iti /
GK16visa03cu:981: nanu yadi caitanyasya sajñānatvena jaḍasya svaprakāśatā tadā pramātṛbhāvamāpannasyāntaḥ karaṇasyāpi svaprakāśatvaṃ syāditi cenmaivam /
GK16visa03cu:982: tatra hi triguṇātmake manasi sattvāṃśasya rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭatvam /
GK16visa03cu:988: yadi ratyādikaṃ prakāśaśarīrādatiriktaṃ syāttadaivāsya svaprakāśatvaṃ na sidhyate,
GK16visa03cu:992: “yadyapi rasānanyatayā carvaṇāpi na kāryā tathāpi kādācitkatayā kāryatvamupakalpya tadekātmanyanādivāsanāpariṇatirūpe ratyādibhāve 'pi vyavahāra iti bhāvaḥ” iti /
GK16visa03cu:993: “sukhāditādātmyāḍgīkāre cāsmākī siddhāntaśayyāmadhiśayya divyaṃ varṣasahastraṃ pramodanidrāmupeyāḥ” iti ca /
GK16visa03cu:994: “abhinno 'pi sa pramātrā vāsanopanītaratyāditādātmyena gocarīkṛtaḥ” iti ca /
GK16visa03cu:1000: tayā rasādirūpā pariṇatiryasya tādṛśarūpe ratyādibhāge vibhāvādikāryatvavyavahāraḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1001: dvitīya iti ceti paryantaṃ samvādavākyatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:1008: gecarīkṛta iti cidānandamayoyaṃ puruṣa iti vadupacāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1012: ratyādayo hi prathamamekaikaśaḥ pratīyamānāḥ sarve 'pyekībhūtāḥ sphuranta eva rasatāmāpadyante /
GK16visa03cu:1023: vibhāvā ityādi kārikāyāṃ ratyādiprakāśasukhacamatkārā akaṇṭhoktā api prakaraṇadavaseyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1030: brahmatattvavaditi---khaṇḍākhaṇaaḍanānāpadārthānām advaitabhāvānayā akhaṇḍasvarūpatvāt brahmatattvasya itica ityantaṃ samvādavākyam /
GK16visa03cu:1033: [text of comm. wanting in both printed ed. and Sansknet e-text/]
GK16visa03cu:1035: athaṃ ke te vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇa ityapekṣāyāṃ vibhāvamāha--
GK16visa03cu:1040_0: ye hi loke rāmādigataratihāsādīnāmudvodhakāraṇāni sītādayasta eva kāvye nāṭye ca
GK16visa03cu:1045: natu pratītyarthaṃ kathaṃ viśeṣeṇa bhāvyantetatpratipādanasāmarthya eva tathātvaucityādityata āhaāsvādāṅkureti /
GK16visa03cu:1048: ato vibhāvā ucyante ityarthaḥ sāmājikaratyādibhāvānāṃ tathātvakaraṇaṃ rāmādiratyādīnāṃ ca tatrāropāt bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:1051: asyā paribhāṣāyāyogārūḍhatvādetadyogārthasyānubhāvādau sattvepi na tatra prayoga iti prāgapyuktam /
GK16visa03cu:1058: (vi, ṅa) śabdopahiteti--tān prasiddhān kaṃsādīn śrīkṛṣṇādikrodhasya raudrarasasthāyibhāvasthālambanavibhāvān śabdopahitarūpān śabdopasthāpyāt pratyakṣāniva sāmājikā manyante /
GK16visa03cu:1064: (lo, ī) śabdeti---śabdopahitarūpān kāvyarūpaśabdopādhinā śravaṇāt tadvuddhiviṣayatāmāpannānāṃ sādhanatvena sotsāhādyudabodhe manyante sabhyā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1073: atha yasya rasasya yo vibhāvaḥ sa tatsvarūpavarṇane vakṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:1101: (vi, ja) prathamaṃ caturbheda iti---paścāttu dhīrodāttādīnām api dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭatvādibhedasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1137: tatra teṣāṃ dhīrodāttādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭānukūlaśaṭhatvena ṣoḍaśaprakārā nāyakaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1138: eṣu tvanekamahilāsu samarāgo dakṣiṇaḥ kathitaḥ // VisSd_3.35 //
GK16visa03cu:1150: ityantaḥ purasundarīḥ prati mayā vijñāyā vijñāpite devenāpratipattimūḍhamanasā dvitrāḥ sthitaṃ nāḍikāḥ //
GK16visa03cu:1154: anekapatnīsambhogārhā iyaṃ rātririti tatkarmaniyuktasya rājñi nivedanam /
GK16visa03cu:1161: sarvāsu anurāgasāmyena kasyāpyupekṣānarhatvāt apratipattyā kartavyanirṇayābhāvena mūḍhamanaskatvena dvitrādidaṇḍasthitiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1171: śoṇaṃ vīkṣya mukhaṃ vicumbitumahaṃ yātaḥ samīpaṃ tataḥ pādena prahṛtaṃ tayā,
GK16visa03cu:1177_0: (vi, ḍha) śoṇaṃ vīkṣyeti---roṣāruṇamukhīṃ priyāṃ cumbituṃ gatasya tayā prahartumudyataṃ
GK16visa03cu:1177_1: pādaṃ dhṛtvā kiñcit kartumakṣamīkṛtāṃ rudatīṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā hasitavato nāyakasya sakhyau
GK16visa03cu:1191: kintvanye 'pi janā vadanti subhago 'pyasyāḥ priyo nānyato dṛṣṭaṃ nikṣipatīti viśvamiyatā manyāmahe duḥsthitam //
GK16visa03cu:1194: (vi, ṇa) asmākaṃ sakhīti--paṣyau subhagāyā sakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:1196: kintu na kevalamahamanyepi janā vadanti asyāḥ patiranyato 'nyasyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ na nikṣipatīti /
GK16visa03cu:1198: mayi asūyayā madapekṣayā saubhāgyālpatvena vā duḥ sthitaṃ vayaṃ manyāmahe /
GK16visa03cu:1211: yaḥ punarekasyāmeva nāyikāyāṃ baddhabhāvo dvayorapi nāyikayorbahirdarśitānurāgo 'nyasyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ gūḍhaṃ vipriyamācarita sa śaṭhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1214: tadetatkvācakṣe ghṛtamadhumayatvadvahuvaco- viṣeṇāghūrṇantī kimapi na sakhī me gaṇayati” //
GK16visa03cu:1217: (vi, ta) śaṭhānyasyā iti---nāyikāyā vipriyakāriṇaṃ nāyakaṃ bhartsayantyā sakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:1218: he śaṭha / mama sakhīm āśliṣyanneva tvaṃ yadanyasyā nāyikāyāḥ kāñcīmaṇiraṇitaśabdamākarṇya sahasā praśithilabhujagranthiḥ (vāhuveṣṭanaṃ)
GK16visa03cu:1220: ato me sakhī ghṛtamadhumayena miśritaghṛtamadhurūpeṇa tvadīyabahucāṭuvacoviṣeṇāghūrṇantī kimapi kartavyaṃ na gaṇayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1234: (vi, da) atha prasaṅgāditi---atra eṣāmityanena nāyakamātrasyaiva parāmarśo natu prakānta śṛṅgārīyāṣṭacatvāriṃśata eva /
GK16visa03cu:1235: ata eva rāmasya sugrīvaḥ sahāyo darśayiṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:1251: (vi, dha) dūrānuvartinīti vyācaṣṭe---tasyeti dūrānuvartini ityasya vyākhyā bahuvyāpinīti bahudeśavyāpyasādhye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1257: bhaktā narmasu nipuṇāḥ kupitavadhūmānabhañjanāḥ śuddhāḥ // VisSd_3.40 //
GK16visa03cu:1261: veśopacārakuśalo vāggmī madhuro 'tha bahumato goṣṭhyām // VisSd_3.41 //
GK16visa03cu:1299: “mantrī svaṃ cobhayaṃ vāpi sakhā tasyārthacintane” iti kenācillakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam,
GK16visa03cu:1302: “nāyakasyārthacintane mantrī sahāyaḥ” ityukte 'pi nāyakasyārthata eva siddhatvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1305: (vi, ma) svaṃ ceti--svaṃ rājā tasya rājñaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1307: atra svasyāpi sahāyatvena kathanāt pūrvasmād bhedaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1319: (vi, ya) mantriṇeti---lalito dhīralalitastādṛśo rājā mantriṇaivārthasādhakaḥ iti śeṣaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:1324: “niścinto mṛduraniśaṃ kalāparo dhīralalitaḥ syāditi dhīralalitalakṣaṇe niścintetvainārthacintanasya mantrimātraniṣṭhatvasiddhestasya mantriṇaḥ sahāyatākathanaṃ gatārthamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1328: ayaṃ mantrī syādarthānāṃ cintāyāmiti sūtrasya parabhāgaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1335: kintu rājā kenārthacintanaṃ kuryādityapekṣāyāmeva kvacin mantriṇā kvacidātmanā,
GK16visa03cu:1347: so 'yamanūḍhābhrātā rājñaḥ śyālaḥ śakāra ityuktaḥ // VisSd_3.44 //
GK16visa03cu:1351: duṣkulatā aiśvaryaṃ ca tābhyāṃ saṃyuktopi madamūrkhatābhyāmabhimānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1358: naṣṭaṃ varṣavarairmanuṣyagaṇanābhāvādapāsya trapā- mantaḥ kañcukikañcukasya viśati trāsādayaṃ vāmanaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1359: paryantāśrayibhinijasya sadṛśaṃ nāmnaḥ kirātaiḥ kṛtaṃ kubjā nīcatayaiva yānti śanakairātmekṣaṇāśaṅkinaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:1362: (vi, la) naṣṭaṃ varṣavarairiti---rājño vājiśālāta āgatamekaṃ mahāvanaraṃ dṛṣṭvā antaḥ purasthanapuṃsakādīnāṃ bhītikriyāvarṇanamidam /
GK16visa03cu:1364: nijasya nāmna iti kṛ vekṣepa iti dhātunā kirātapadasya sādhitatvāt svasya paryantaviśīrṇatvaṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1366: kintu nīcatayaiva vānarakartṛke ātmakarmake īkṣaṇe aśaṅkinaḥ śaṅkārahitāḥ santaḥ śanakairyāntītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1404: suśliṣṭaṃ kurute kāryaṃ nisṛṣṭārthastu sa smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.48 //
GK16visa03cu:1415: yāvaditi prerakeṇa yāvada bhāṣitasya sandeśasa hāraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1427: sattvajāḥ tadudbhavāḥ sattvavatāṃ nāyakānā guṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1431: nīye ghṛṇādhike spardhā yataḥ śobheti tāṃ viduḥ // VisSd_3.51 //
GK16visa03cu:1435: (vi, sa) yataḥ śobheti--yato balāt śobhālakṣaṇena anurāgitoktā /
GK16visa03cu:1445: prakṛtiṣu amātyeṣu madhye sarva eva ityacintayat kiṃ tat ityatrāha--ahameveti /
GK16visa03cu:1449: nimnagā nadyaḥ tāsāṃ sarvāsāmevodadhinā jalagrahaṇena kṛtādaratvāt /
GK16visa03cu:1454: (vi, ka) dhīreti---vilāse sāttvike guṇe sati dhīretyādikaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1458: kaumārake 'pi girivadgurutāṃ dadhāno vīro rasaḥ kimayametyuta darpa eva //
GK16visa03cu:1462: tṛṇīkṛto jagattrayasya sattvānāṃ balānāṃ sāraḥ prakṛṣṭo bhāgo yathā /
GK16visa03cu:1470: (vi, ga) ūhyamudāharaṇamiti--- “tyajato maṅgalakṣaume cīre ca pratigṛhṇataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1473_0: atra hi maṅgalakṣaume gṛhṇataḥ cīre pratīlakṣīkṛtya tyajataśca rāmasya mukharāgaṃ
GK16visa03cu:1473_1: vismitā janāḥ samānaṃ dadṛśuḥ ityanena vanavāsārthaṃ cīragrahaṇasaṃkṣobhepi maṅgalakṣaumagrahaṇavad anudvegaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1479: atra bhayaśokayoḥ praveśāt mādhuryataḥ kiyān bhedaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1483: ātmapakṣaparipūrite jaga- tyasya nityasukhinaḥ kuto bhayam //
GK16visa03cu:1485: iyaṃ hi tapasyataḥ parameśvareṇa bhīṣitasya kasyaciduktiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:1488: ātmapakṣeṇa bhavatā paripūrite jagati asya kuto bhayamityarthaḥ /

GK16visa03cu:3738: eṣāṃ rasānāṃ varṇadaivatakathanaṃ nāṭakādiṣu vidheyāvighnahetukeṣu naṭasaṃpādyapūjādiṣu pratyūhyate /

GK16visa03cu:3754: yatra tu ratiḥ prakṛṣṭā nābhīṣṭamupaiti vipralambho 'sā /
GK16visa03cu:3761: tena māninyāmanukūlatāyāṃ prāptāyāmapi nāyakasya vipralambha eva /
GK16visa03cu:3763: (lo, ū) yatra tviti---ratiruktaṇṭhā prakṛṣṭā prakṛṣṭatāṃ yātiratiprakarṣasya nāyikāniṣṭatve nāyakaṃ nāyakapakṣe ca nāyikāṃ nopaiti na prāptotītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3769: daśāviśeṣo yo 'prāptau pūrvarāgaḥ sa ucyate // VisSd_3.188 //
GK16visa03cu:3776: sa ca śravaṇāt darśanāt vā bhavatītyuktatvāt śravaṇadarśanayorupāyamāha---
GK16visa03cu:3779: indrajāle ca citre ca sākṣātsvaṣne ca darśanam // VisSd_3.189 //
GK16visa03cu:3782: (vi, ṭha) śravaṇaṃ tviti---dūtādimukhāt śravaṇam indrajālasvaprābhyāṃ cakṣuṣā vā darśanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3786: unmādo 'tha vyādhirjaḍatā mṛtiriti daśātra kāmadaśāḥ // VisSd_3.190 //
GK16visa03cu:3800: tathā ca vyādhijvarāditi yaduktaṃ prāk tadīyādipadagrāhyamidaṃ muktamiti bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:3804: “premārdrāḥ praṇayaspṛśaḥ paricayādudrāḍharāgodayā- stāstā mugdhadṛśo nisargamadhurāśceṣṭā bhaveyurmayi /
GK16visa03cu:3805: yāsvantaḥ karaṇasya bāhyakaraṇavyāpārarodhī kṣaṇā- dāśaṃsāparikalpitāsvapi bhavatyānandasāndro layaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:3809: mukhadṛśo mālatyāstāstāḥ anyādṛśaḥ ceṣṭā mayi bhaveyuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3815: yāsu ceṣṭāsu āśaṃsāyāmicchāyāṃ parikalpitāsvapi antaḥ karaṇasya ānandena sāndro vyāpto layaḥ līnatā kṣaṇādbhavati /
GK16visa03cu:3820: (lo, ṛ) premārdrā iti---darśanādigato bhāvavyañjakaḥ kaścana cittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ prema tatpūrvako vaśīkāraḥ praṇayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3826: iti cintākulaḥ kānto nidrāṃ naiti niśīthinīm” //
GK16visa03cu:3841: “tribhāgaśeṣāsu niśāsu ca kṣamaṃ nimīlya netre sahasā vyabudhyana /
GK16visa03cu:3847: pārvatīsakhyā vijayāyā jaṭilaveśapracchannaṃ maheśa prati uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3848: bhāgatraye jāgaritatvāt śeṣāvaśiṣṭāsu niśāsu netre nimīlya mīlayitvā iyaṃ sahasā vyabudhyata /
GK16visa03cu:3849: kīdṛśī asatye harasya kaṇṭhe 'rpitabāhubandhanā satī he nīlakaṇṭha /
GK16visa03cu:3854: “pāṇḍu kṣāmaṃ vadanaṃ hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3857: (lo, ṝ) pāṇiḍvati---parakṣetre na chedanīyo rogaḥ kṣetriyarogaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3862: (vi, da) pāṇḍukṣāmāmiti---mālatyāṃ tadvirahāvasthāṃ pṛcchantyā lavaṅgikāyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3863: he sakhi / tava hṛdantaḥ kṣetriyarogam asmin kṣetre śarīre acikitsyaṃ rogaṃ pāṇḍukṣāmavadanādikaṃ karttṛ āvedayatītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3868: dīho ṇīsāsaharo eso sāhei jīaitti paraṃ” //
GK16visa03cu:3872: dīrgho niḥ śvāsabhara eṣa sādhayati jīvatīti param /
GK16visa03cu:3875: ato dīrghaniśvāsa eva iyaṃ jīvati sādhayati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3884: (vi, na) cetasākāṅkṣitamiti---maraṇākāṅkṣā eva varṇanīyā na maraṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3889: “śephālikāṃ vidalitāmavalokya tanvī prāṇān kathaṃcidapi dhārayituṃ prabhūtā /
GK16visa03cu:3890: ākarṇya saṃprati rutaṃ caraṇāyudhānāṃ kiṃ vā bhaviṣyati na vedmi tapasvinī sā” //
GK16visa03cu:3893: (vi, pa) śephālikāmiti---vidalitāṃ patitakusumāṃ kiñcidavaśiṣṭāyāṃ rātrau tadvidalanāt,
GK16visa03cu:3896: prātaḥ kāla eveti tatra maraṇasaṃbhāvanayā sakhyā viṣādoktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3899: (lo, ḷ) śephālikāmiti---śephālikāvidalanena niśīthakālaḥ sūcitaḥ tapasvinī śocyā /
GK16visa03cu:3902: “rolambāḥ paripūrayantu harito jhaṃkārakolāhalair mandaṃ mandamupaitu candanavanījāto nabhasvānapi /
GK16visa03cu:3903: mādyantaḥ kalayantu cūtaśikhare kelīpikāḥ pañcamaṃ prāṇāḥ satvaramaśmasārakaṭhinā gacchantu gacchantvamī” //
GK16visa03cu:3926: eṣa ca prakāraḥ karuṇaḥ vipralambhaviṣaya iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3935: unmādo mūrcchā mṛtirityetāḥ smaradaśā daśaiva syu” /
GK16visa03cu:3938: ādau vācyaḥ striyā rāgaḥ puṃsaḥ paścāttadiṅgitaiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3952: nīlī kusumbhaṃ mañjiṣṭhā pūrvarāgo 'pi ca tridhā // VisSd_3.195 //
GK16visa03cu:3964: (vi, ma) na cātiśobhate iti---avispaṣṭatvāt na cātiśobhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3965: śrīrāmasītayoriti---śrīrāmasya dhīrodāttatvāt purūvasa ivātyantapralāpābhāvena nātiśobhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3968: mānaḥ kopaḥ sa tu dvedhā praṇayerṣyāsamudbhavaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3972: praṇayena īrṣyayā vā samudbhavo yasya tādṛśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3974: dvayoḥ praṇayamānaḥ syāt pramode sumahatyapi // VisSd_3.198 //
GK16visa03cu:3975: premṇaḥ kuṭilagāmitvāt kopo yaḥ kāraṇaṃ vinā /
GK16visa03cu:3976: dvayoriti nāyakasya nāyikāyāśca ubhayośca praṇayamāno varṇanīyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3988: praṇayamānena alīkaprasuptaṃ nāyakaṃ cumbitvā tenāślādhitāyā nāyikāyāstaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:3992: mayā te tava gaṇḍaparicumbanayā pulakitamarthāt tavāṅgameva mamāvakāśo mama sthityavakāśaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:3995: atra ca“prāgāmantritamasakṛdi“ti sūtreṇa te ityasya asambhavo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4008: etaccirāyitāyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ sakalāmapi śayyāmāvṛtya mithyāprasuptasya nāyakasya gaṇḍaṃ paricumbya tasyā vacanam /
GK16visa03cu:4014: atra pārvatīṃ tyaktvā sandhyāvandanāya gate maheśe pārvatyā māne tasya tadbhaṅgapravṛttau tatra hi “sandhyayā kamalayonikanyayā yā tanuḥ sutanu /
GK16visa03cu:4032: atra ko mallaḥ kaściraṃ soḍhuṃ samarthaḥ na jñāyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4042: “bhrūbhaṅge racite 'pi dṛṣṭiradhikaṃ sotkaṇṭhamudvīkṣate ruddhāyāmapi vāci sammitamidaṃ dagdhānanaṃ jāyate /
GK16visa03cu:4043: kārkaśyaṃ gamite 'pi cetasi tanū romāñcamālambate dṛṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñjane” //
GK16visa03cu:4046: (vi, ṣa) mayā bhrūbhaṅge racite 'pi mama dṛṣṭistaṃ priyaṃ sotkaṇṭhamudvīkṣate /
GK16visa03cu:4047: ityādirītyā tasmin jane priyatame dṛṣṭe sati kathaṃ mānasya nirvahaṇaṃ nirvāho bhaviṣyatītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4051: “ekasmiñśayane parāṅmukhatayā vītottaraṃ tāmyator anyonyasya hṛdi sthite 'pyanunaye saṃrakṣatorgauravam /
GK16visa03cu:4069: tvaṃ kiṃ brūṣe na bhavati madanyatra nirataḥ patirme dhūrtto 'sāvṛjurasi na jānāsi tamimam /
GK16visa03cu:4070: samudratyāgārādaparayuvatīsaṅganirato mayā dṛṣṭaḥ svapne tadalamiha saṃprītikathayā //
GK16visa03cu:4081: (vi, ha) navanakheti---anyanāyikāsaṅgacihnakhapadādimaṃśukādinā yadyapi gopāyituṃ śaknoṣi tathāpi vimardetthāṅgarāgagandhaḥ kena prakāreṇa vārayituṃ śakya iti vākyārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4084: gotraskhalite yathā---“ekasmin śayane vipakṣaramaṇīnāmagrahe mugdhayā sadyaḥ kopaparāṅmukhaṃ śayitayā cāṭūni kurvannapi /
GK16visa03cu:4085: āvegādavadhīritaḥ priyatamaḥ tūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ tat kṣaṇād mābhūt supta ivetyamandavalitagrīvaṃ punarvokṣitaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:4088: mama sa yat cāṭu kurute samasto 'sau vyājapraṇaya iti jānīhi niyatam /
GK16visa03cu:4089: tadā tāṃ tu dhyāyan sa khalu kitavaḥ kelisamaye muhustasya nāmnā nanu rahasi sambodhayati mām //
GK16visa03cu:4092: sāma bhedo 'tha dānaṃ ca natyupekṣe rasāntaram /
GK16visa03cu:4093: tadbhaṅgāya patiḥ kuryāt ṣaḍupāyāniti kramāt // VisSd_3.201 //
GK16visa03cu:4095: dānaṃ vyājena bhūṣādeḥ pādayoḥ patanaṃ natiḥ // VisSd_3.202 //
GK16visa03cu:4125: gacchannityatra upekṣā etāḥ pañca sūcitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4126: ebhirupāyairasya mānabhaṅgābhāve 'pi na tadupāyahīniḥ tasyāmajātodvegarūpasahakāriviraheṇa phalānutpādanāt /
GK16visa03cu:4128: rasāntarantūhyamiti--harṣād yathā---“cirapravāsāt suhṛdi prayāte yastatra harṣo mithunasya jātaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4132: bhayād yathā---“pravṛtte mānabhaṅgāya patyau nāga upāgataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4133: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā kaṇṭhe patiṃ jagrāha māninī //
GK16visa03cu:4143: (vi, kha) vipralambhasya pūrvarāgamānapravāsakaruṇarūpacāturvidhyasya uktatvāt pūrvarāgaṃ mānñca samāpya pravāsamāha---atha pravāsa iti /
GK16visa03cu:4148: mṛtiśceti kramājjñeyā daśa smaradaśā iha // VisSd_3.206 //
GK16visa03cu:4168: patyau pravāsasthe karatale gaṇḍaṃ kṛtvā cintayantīṃ prati kasyaciduktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4170: bhāvī bhavanbhūta iti tridhā syāttatra kāryajaḥ // VisSd_3.208 //
GK16visa03cu:4175: (vi, ṅa) pravāsasya kāryyāt śāpāt ityādi traividhyasyoktatvāt kāryyajameva trividhamāha--bhāvīti /
GK16visa03cu:4183: śokaste gamane kuto mama tato vāṣpaṃ kathaṃ muñcasi /
GK16visa03cu:4184: śīghraṃ na vrajasīti māṃ gamayituṃ kasmādiyaṃ te tvarā,
GK16visa03cu:4185: bhūyānasya saha tvayā jigamiṣorjovasya me saṃbhramaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4198: tvayā saha jigamiṣoḥ asya me jīvasya bhūyān saṃbhramastvaretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4201: tava gamane mama kutaḥ śokaḥ jīvanābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4205: mayi kṛtakapremakavastaba na khalu kadācid gamanam /
GK16visa03cu:4208: gamane hasasotpanne eṣāmapi niryāṇa ākulībhāvo nivarttatāmiti /
GK16visa03cu:4215: yātuṃ niścitacetasi priyatame sarve samaṃ prasthitā gantavye sati jīvita /
GK16visa03cu:4221: he jīvita / priyatame yātuṃ niścitacetasi sati tavāpi gantavye gatatve sati valayādipriyasuhṛtsārthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4225: prasthānaṃ yātrā bahudinavyāpakatadvārttayā kārśyena valayabhraṃśaḥ gataṃ calitam /
GK16visa03cu:4227: tacca maraṇahetuśokādiduḥ khe 'pyaśrupātena tadduḥ khasya kiñcidupaśamāt /
GK16visa03cu:4236: atra pūrvarāgoktānāmabhilāṣādīnāmatroktānāṃ cāṅgāsauṣṭhavādīnāmapi daśānānubhayeṣāmapyubhayatra sambhave 'pi cirantanaprasiddhyā vivicya pratipādanam /
GK16visa03cu:4243: tatra ca devena urvaśyā haraṇameva daiva utpātaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4252: tathā ca tatra vipralambha eva ityuktvā prathamaṃ karuṇaḥ paścāttu vipralambha ityabhiyuktānāṃ mataṃ darśayitumāha--kiñceti /
GK16visa03cu:4254: yathā pūrvarāgamānapravāsarūpā viśeṣāstathā maraṇasyāpi viśeṣasya sambhavādetadbhedena pravāsabhinnamapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4258: etadgranthakṛtaḥ kuvalayāśvacarite ca yuvatermadālasāyastathābhāve kuvalayāśvasya śarīrāntareṇa labhye ajendumatīvṛttāntavat /
GK16visa03cu:4261: punaralabhye śarīrāntareṇa bālabhye tu karuṇākhya eva rasaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4266: yaccātra “saṅgamapratyāśānantaramapi bhavato vipralambhaśṛṅgārasya pravāsākhyo bheda eva” iti kecidāhuḥ,
GK16visa03cu:4270: ayamāśayaḥ---yathā bhavadbhirekadeśasthayorviyogo virahākhyaḥ videśasthayoḥ pravāsākhya iti īṣadbhinnadharmayoge 'pi bhedaḥ svīkṛtaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4272: śarīrāntare tu karuṇa iti bahutarabhinnayoge iti kā kṣatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4273: yattu kaiścid abhilāṣapravāserṣyāvirahaśāpahetukatvena pañcadhā vipralambhaityuktam tatra saṅgamaprāgabhāvarūpo 'bhilāṣaḥ pūrvarāga eva /
GK16visa03cu:4276: yadā tu paroḍhāviṣayaḥ tadā rasābhāvasattvāt na śṛṅgararasabhedaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:4279: atra eva maharṣiṇā pravāsadaśadaśālakṣaṇe“pūrvānubhava jā jñeyā daśa smaradaśā iha“iti pūrvānubhavatvamuktam /
GK16visa03cu:4284: yadi caikadeśasthayorna pravāsastat kathaya kiyati yojane kiyati vā kośe 'sau maharṣibhirnirūpitaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4285_1: purvaṃrāgastayā cakavākayostṛṇamātravyavadhāne 'pi śāpravāsā khyaśṛṅgārābhāsa iti sarvaṃ sustham /
GK16visa03cu:4300: kadācit ekaikena kadācittūbhayena nāpi darśanādikaṃ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4301: tena ekaikasya darśanādau api sambhogo boddhyaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4305: digdho 'mṛtena ca viṣeṇa ca pakṣmalākṣyā gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye kaṭākṣaḥ //
GK16visa03cu:4310: ayameka eva dhīraiḥ kathitaḥ saṃbhogaśṛṅgāraḥ // VisSd_3.211 //
GK16visa03cu:4315: “yatkiñcilloke śuci medhyamujjvalaṃ darśanīyaṃ vā tatsarvaṃ śṛṅgāreṇopamīyate (upayujyate ca)” iti /
GK16visa03cu:4319: medhyaṃ pavitram anyad vā yat taduddīpanavibhāvarūpatayā vācyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4321: śṛṅgāreṇa hetunā upamīyate taduddīpanatayā upamīyate upasthāpyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4333: kaṣāyite hi vastrādau bhūyān rāgo vivardhate” //
GK16visa03cu:4335: tatra pūrvarāgānantaraṃ saṃbhogo yathā kumārasambhave pārvatīparameśvarayoḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4338: (vi, ṭha) sambhogaśṛṅgārasya evavidhatvamuktvā pūrvarāgādyānantaryeṇa tasya cāturvidhyaṃ vaktumāha--kiñceti /
GK16visa03cu:4347: etādṛkkṛśatā kutaḥ tuha puṇo puṭṭhaṃ sarīraṃ jado /
GK16visa03cu:4351: na kapi me, jai idaṃ khemaṃ kudo pucchasi” //
GK16visa03cu:4356: jai iti--- yadi idaṃ kṣemaṃ kutaḥ pṛcchasi /
GK16visa03cu:4357: ayamarthaḥ---yadāhameva praṇayinī kimiti māṃ parihṛtya dūraṃ gato 'si yaddhetukastavāyaṃ praśraḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4359: saṃyogaviyogau ca parasparāyattatārūpau tena dūtipraṣaṇādeḥ saṃbhogaviṣayatvam /
GK16visa03cu:4365: (vi, ḍa) kṣemaṃ te nanu ityādi---ime dampatyoruktipratyuktī /
GK16visa03cu:4372: puṭṭhamiti---tava punaḥ śarīraṃ puṣṭaṃ yata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4373: paṇaiṇīti---praṇayinyā mama dehasya saṃbhiśraṇāt saṃkocāt kṛśīkaraṇādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4376: ato māṃ kṛśāṃ kṛtvā manmāsena tava śarīraṃ puṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4378: he subhru / tvattaḥ kāpi na me kāpi puṣṭiḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4379: jai idamiti yadīdaṃ tadā kṣemaṃ kutaḥ pṛcchasi /
GK16visa03cu:4381: matkārśye 'pi tava paṣṭyā ca mayi tavānurāgābhāvenaiva puṣṭiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4382: anurāgasattve tu madvirahāt kārśyaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4384: tatra ca maraṇānantaraṃ jīvane mahāśvetāpuṇḍarīkayoḥ sambhoge /
GK16visa03cu:4398: smitahasita iti---kasyāciduttamanāyakasya smitaṃ kasyacittu hasitam ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4401: (lo, ai) hāsya iti---vikṛtād vikiyāyuktāda vāgveśaceṣṭādeḥ kuhakākhyavañcanāprayogācca hāsyaraso bhavediti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4407: kiñcillakṣyadvijaṃ tatra hasitaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ // VisSd_3.218 //
GK16visa03cu:4409: apahasitaṃ sāstrākṣaṃ vikṣiptāṅgaṃ ca bhavatyatihasitam // VisSd_3.219 //
GK16visa03cu:4423: kāyocchvasanadṛṣṭisaṅkocādayo harṣāvahitthādayaśca anubhāvavyabhicāriṇaḥ anuktā api sāmarthyāllabhyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4427: yasya hāsaḥ sa ceta kvāpi sākṣānnaiva nibadhyate /
GK16visa03cu:4433: (vi, ta) atra cottamādiṣu ya upahāsakastasya smitādikamunneyam /
GK16visa03cu:4436: abhedeneti---sa upahāsakaḥ sāmājikaiḥ vibhāvādisādhāraṇyāt yataḥ abhedena pratīyate tato hāsyaraso 'yamanumīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4441: tataśca svādanākhyena vyāpāreṇa hāsyarasa āsvādyata iti pūrvāparagranthaniṣkarṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4456: “vipine kva jaṭānibandhanaṃ tava cedaṃ kva manoharaṃ vapuḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4457: anayorghaṭanā vidheḥ sphuṭaṃ nanu khaḍgena śirīṣakarttanam” //
GK16visa03cu:4465: tatra bandhuviyoge yathā---“hā mātastvaritāsi kutra kimidaṃ hā devatāḥ kvāśiṣaḥ dhik prāṇān patito 'śanirhutavahaste 'ṅgeṣu dagdhe dṛśau /
GK16visa03cu:4466: itthaṃ ghargharamadhyaruddhakaruṇāpaurāṅganānāṃ giraḥ citrasthānapi rodayanti śatadhā kurvanti bhittīrapi //
GK16visa03cu:4467: “idaṃ madālasāyāṃ mṛtāyāṃ purastrīṇāṃ rodanasya kenāpi kathanam /
GK16visa03cu:4468: vittanāśe yathā-“kiṃ karomi kka gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ kka vrajāmyaham /
GK16visa03cu:4474: vipralambhe ratiḥ sthāyī punaḥ saṃbhogahetukaḥ // VisSd_3.226 //
GK16visa03cu:4495: narakaripuṇā sārdhaṃ teṣāṃ sabhīmakirīṭinā- mayamahamasṛṅmedomāṃsaiḥ karomi diśāṃ balim” //
GK16visa03cu:4500_0: idaṃ svayaṃ mṛtasya mama pituḥ śiracchedarūpaṃ gurupātakaṃ yairudāyudhairmanujapaśubhirnirmayādairbhavaddhiḥ
GK16visa03cu:4500_1: kṛtamanumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā narakāsurasya ripuṇā śrīkṛṣṇena sārddhaṃ sabhīmakirīṭināṃ
GK16visa03cu:4500_2: teṣāṃ medomāṃsaiḥ diśāṃ diksthitabhūtānāṃ balimayamaham etatkṣaṇavartto ahaṃ karomītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4503: narakaripupadopādānāt narakahetupātakahantāraṃ gurupātakakāriṇañca haniṣyāmīti sūcanāt matkrodhe jagadeva naṅkṣyati iti sūcitam /
GK16visa03cu:4522: sa ca dānadarmayuddhairdayayā ca samanvitaścaturdhā syāt // VisSd_3.234 //
GK16visa03cu:4523: sa ca vīro dānavīro dharmavīro yuddhavīro dayāvīraśceti caturvidhaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4529: harṣadhṛtyādibhaiḥ saṃcāribhiḥ puṣṭiṃ nīto dānavīratāṃ bhajate /
GK16visa03cu:4532: (vi, pa) tyāgaḥ saptasamudreti---saptasamudrāvṛttayā mahyā nirvyājadānaparyyantaḥ tyāga ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4537: “rājyaṃ ca vasu dehaśca bhāryā bhrātṛsutāśca ye /
GK16visa03cu:4538: yacca loke mamāyattaṃ tad dharmāya sadodyatam” //
GK16visa03cu:4541: dīyatāṃ janakajā rāmaḥ svayaṃ yācate ko 'yaṃ te mativibhramaḥ smara nayaṃ nādyāpi kiṃcidratam /
GK16visa03cu:4542: naivaṃ cet kharadūṣaṇatriśirasāṃ kaṇṭhāsṛjā paṅkilaḥ pattrī naiṣa sahiṣyate mama dhanurjyābandhabandhūkṛtaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4546: rāmo rāmanāmnā khyāto vālihantā svayaṃ yācate /
GK16visa03cu:4549: mayā saha sandherupāyaḥ ko 'pi na gata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4550: naivaṃ cet sītā na dīyate cet tadā mama dhanuḥ jyābandhasya bandhūkṛta eṣa patrī vāṇo na sahiṣyate /
GK16visa03cu:4554: “śirāmukhaiḥ syandata eva raktamadyāpi dehe mama māṃsamasti /
GK16visa03cu:4555: tṛptiṃ na paśyāmi tavāpi tāvat kiṃ bhakṣaṇāttvaṃ virato garutman / /
GK16visa03cu:4560: garuḍena bhakṣyamāṇaṃ nāgaṃ paritrātuṃ tadbhakṣaṇāya ātmadehamarpitavatastadbhakṣitabahumāṃsasya jīmūtavāhanasyātṛptaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4563: atra hetumāha---mama kīdṛśasya śirāmukheṃ raktaṃ syandata eva /
GK16visa03cu:4564: ato yadyapi bahūni māṃsāni bhakṣitāni tathāpi tṛptimātmani na paśyāmi /
GK16visa03cu:4576: (vi, bha) bhayānakānubhāveṣu pulakaḥ kiñcid aṅgeṣu romāñcaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4593: ārttaḥ paryastanetraḥ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ pretaraṅkaḥ karaṅkādaṅkasthādasthiṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyamadhyagramatti” //
GK16visa03cu:4598: utkṛtyeti---karālārādhanāya gatasya mādhavasya śavaṃ bhuñjānaṃ pretaṃ dṛṣṭvā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4601: aṅkasthāt śavāt asthisaṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyaṃmāṃsaṃ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ sannavyagraṃ yathā syāttathātti /
GK16visa03cu:4602: kiṃ kṛtvā prathamaṃ kṛttiṃ carmma utkṛtyokṛtya /
GK16visa03cu:4603: athānantaraṃ aṃse bhujamūle sphici nitambe pṛṣṭe ca /
GK16visa03cu:4607: māṃsāni kīdṛśāni pṛthunā ucchothena tatphullatayā bhūyāṃsi bahūni tathā atidurgandhīni /
GK16visa03cu:4618: guṇānāṃ tasya mahimā bhaveduddīpanaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_3.243 //
GK16visa03cu:4631: dordaṇḍeti--rāmeṇa dhanuṣi bhagne tacchabdaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4632: dordaṇḍenāñcitasya utkṣiptasya candraśekharadhanurdaṇḍasyāvabhaṅgena udgato jhaṅkāradhvaniḥ aho 'dyāpi na viśrāmyati /
GK16visa03cu:4634: āryyasya rāmasya bālacaritānāṃ prastāvanāyāḥ prakhyāpanāyāḥ ḍiṇḍimo vādyaviśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4635_1: brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍasya caṇḍaśabdāt utphulya punarmilitaṃ brahmāṇḍakapāladvayaṃ tadudare
GK16visa03cu:4642: evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayā milati jāyamāne brahmaṇḍabhāṇḍodare bhrāmyan piṇḍitaḥ piṇḍībhūtaḥ caṇḍimā caṇḍatvaṃ yasyeti jhaṅkāradhvanorviśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa03cu:4655: (vi, ra) anityatvādinā ityatra ādipadāt iṣṭaviyogādinā vairāgyaparigrahaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4663: “rathyāntaścaratastathā dhṛtajarat kanthālavasyādhvagaiḥ satrāsaṃ ca sakautukaṃ ca sadayaṃ dṛṣṭasya tairnāgaraiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4664: nirvyājīkṛtacitsudhārasamudā nidrāyamāṇasya me niḥśaṅkaḥ karaṭaḥ kadā karapuṭībhikṣāṃ viluṇṭhiṣyati” //
GK16visa03cu:4669: nirbojīkṛtayā citsudhārasamudā jñānāmṛtaharṣeṇa nidrāyamāṇasya me kadā karapuṭībhikṣāṃ karaṭaḥ kāko viluṇṭhiṣyati /
GK16visa03cu:4672: bhikṣāviluṇṭhanādibhayābhāvāt niḥ śaṅkaṃ carataḥ rathyāntaḥ nagararājamārgamadhye carataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4674: ataḥ taiḥ rathyāsthaiḥ adhvagairnāgaraiḥ kanthādiviparītadarśanāt satrāsañca sakautukañca daridrāvasthādarśanāt sadayañca dṛṣṭasya /
GK16visa03cu:4683: nirbojīkṛto yo 'sau citjñānameva sudhārasaḥ tena prakāśena yā mut prītiḥ sukhaikamayatā tayā nidrāyamāṇasya paśyato 'pi prameyajātamapaśyataḥ citsudhārasasya /
GK16visa03cu:4684: nirbojīkṛtasyāyamarthaḥ-- nirgataṃ bījaṃ saṃsārakāraṇam avidyākhyaṃ yasmāt prakāśādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4685: nirgataṃ bījam ātmaprakāśajñānakāraṇaṃ mano yatra sa nirbojaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4691: dayāvīrādau hi nāgānandadau jīmūtavāhanāderantarā malayavatyādyanurāgāderante ca vidyādharacakravatitvādyāpterdarśanādahaṅkāropaśamo na dṛśyate /
GK16visa03cu:4695: “na yatra duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na cintā na dveṣarāgau na ca kacidicchā /
GK16visa03cu:4696: rasaḥ sa śāntaḥ kathito manīndraiḥ sarveṣu bhāveṣu samapramāṇaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4700: nāgānandeti---jīmūtavāhananāyake nāgānande nāṭake kāvyaprakāśe śāntasya jīmūtavāhanasya yuktimākṣipatiataśca iti /
GK16visa03cu:4702: atra ca iti---mokṣāvasthīyaśāntaḥ sa evayato rasatāmetīti kāvyanāṭyasamarpitaḥ sanniti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4706: sarveṣu loṣṭrāśmakāñcanādiṣu bhāveṣu padārtheṣu gamaṃ tulyaṃ pramāṇaṃ jñānaṃ yatra /
GK16visa03cu:4708: ityevaṃrūpasya śāntasya mokṣāvasthāyāmevātmasvarūpāpattilakṣaṇāyāṃ prādurbhāvāttatra sañcāryādīnāmabhāvāt kathaṃ rasatvamityucyate--
GK16visa03cu:4710: (lo, ū) ātmeti---ātmasvarūpasya āpattiḥ prāptiḥ lakṣaṇaṃ svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4712: yuktaviyuktadaśāyāmavasthito yaḥ śamaḥ sa eva yataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4713: rasatāmeti tadasmin sañcāryādeḥ sthitiśca na viruddhā // VisSd_3.250 //
GK16visa03cu:4720: tena śāntasya vaiṣayikasukhabhinnaṃ tṛṣṇākṣayādhīnaṃ sukhamastyeva ityuktam /
GK16visa03cu:4722: (lo, ṛ) yukteti---tatra viṣayebhyaḥ parāvṛtya sākṣāt kartavye brahmaṇi mano nidhāya varttamānatvacintāsantānavān yuktaḥ,
GK16visa03cu:4725: yaśca bhūtvendriyajayī aṇimādyaḥ kāyasiddhīrdūraśraṇādyā hyatīndriyāṇi sve sve viṣaye sahattvasannikarṣādisahakāranirapekṣāṇi varttante,
GK16visa03cu:4741: kadā vārāṇasyāmiha suradhunīrodhasi vasan vasānaḥ kaupīnaṃ śirasi nidadhāno 'ñjalipuṭam /
GK16visa03cu:4750_0: kadā vārāṇasyāmiti--iha vārāṇasyāṃ suradhunyā gaṅgāyā rodhasi tīre pulin vā vasan
GK16visa03cu:4750_1: ahaṃ kaupīnadvayañca vasānaḥ śirasyañjalipuṭaṃ dadhānaśca aye gaurīnāthetyādinā'krośan
GK16visa03cu:4751: atra kaupīnādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sukhādirāhityaprāptyā sarvāhaṅkārarāhityalābhād devaviṣayaraterapi śāntarasatvaprāptiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4754: sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4758: (vi, ha) vatsalatāsneha iti---na caivaṃ dayāvīratvaprasaktiriti vācyam ,
GK16visa03cu:4759: ātmāpakāreṇāpi paropacikīrṣāprayojakadharmaviśeṣasya dayātvāt sukhasambandhini anurāgaviśeṣasya ca snehatvāt iti anayorbhedāt /
GK16visa03cu:4772: “yadāha dhātryā prathamoditaṃ vaco yayau tadīyāmavalambya cāṅgalīm /
GK16visa03cu:4773: abhūcca namraḥ praṇipātaśikṣayā piturmudaṃ tena tatāna sor'bhakaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4776: (vi, kṣa) yadāha dhātryeti---uditasya uccāritasya prathamaṃ prathamoditamiti“rājadantādisamāsāt” /
GK16visa03cu:4777: dātryā uditaśca nārāyaṇetyādiśabdaśca prathamaṃ“nā“ityādi yadvacaḥ raghurāha tadīyāṃ dhātrīyām aṅgulimavalambya yacca yayau praṇipātaśikṣayā yacca namno 'bhūt,
GK16visa03cu:4778: tena karmaṇā piturdilīpasya mudaṃ tatāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4785: bhayānakena śāntena tathā vīrarasaḥ smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.256 //
GK16visa03cu:4792: unmādādirna tu sthāyī na pātre syairyameti yat /
GK16visa03cu:4797: (lo, e) nanūnmādānāṃ sthāyitvamavalambya kathamanye 'pi rasā noktāḥ ityāśaṅkyāha--kuto 'pīti /
GK16visa03cu:4807: rasanādrasā iti---rasanam āsvādanaṃ tadrūpasādṛśyāt gauṇyā lakṣaṇayā rasapadārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4810: (lo, ai) nanu yadi rasātmakaṃ vākyameva kāvyaṃ tāha bhāvādipradhānamakāvya syādityaśaṅkyāha---rasābhāvāditi /
GK16visa03cu:4825: sthāyī sthāyibhāvavad vācyo natu sthiratāmāpanna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4828: tathā ca dhvanireva rasa ityataḥ kathaṃ tatra bhāvadhvanitvamityata āha---na bhāvo raseti /
GK16visa03cu:4831: tatra yathāpradhānatayā rasastiṣṭhati evaṃ rase 'pi apradhānatayā bhāvastiṣṭhatītyāha---na bhāvahīna iti /
GK16visa03cu:4833_0: ityuktadiśā paramālocanayā paramaviśrāntisthānena rasena sahaiva vartamānā api rājānugatavivāhapravṛttabhṛtyavadāpātato
GK16visa03cu:4833_1: yatra pradhānyenābhivyaktā vyabhicāriṇo devamunigurunṛpādivaṣayā ca ratirudbuddhamātrā
GK16visa03cu:4839: evaṃ pradhānamapi raso nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyasya bhāvasya pradhānasya anuga ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4840: udvuddhamātrā ityādikaṃ sthāyino bhāvā ityasya viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa03cu:4857: “divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso narake vā narakāntaka / prakāmam /
GK16visa03cu:4861: (vi, ca) divi vā bhuvi veti---he narakāsurāntaka maraṇe jāte mama divi bhuvi vā narake vā vāso 'stu /
GK16visa03cu:4864: tadā ca divi vā ityādikam asambaddhaṃ syāt /
GK16visa03cu:4872: tathāpi śuśraṣurahaṃ garīyasīrgiro 'thavā śreyasi kena tṛpyate” //
GK16visa03cu:4877: he mune tava amunā vilokanenaiva kṛtārthaḥ kato 'smi /
GK16visa03cu:4879: nabarhitaṃ nāśitam aṃhaḥ pāpaṃ yena tādṛśena /
GK16visa03cu:4880: tathāpi tava garīyasīḥ giraḥ śuśrūṣuḥ śrotu micthurammi /
GK16visa03cu:4887: na dhatte śirasā gaṅgāṃ bhūribhārabhiyā haraḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4891: tava vājirājyā nirdhūtaṃ yad dhūlipaṭalaṃ tena paṅkilām /
GK16visa03cu:4906: kandarpeṇa dhanuṣi āropite ākālike vasante jāte tapasyato maheśasya pārvatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃcid dhairyyaparāvṛttivarṇanamidam /
GK16visa03cu:4909: dhairyyaparāvṛtteḥ kiñcid udbhāvena rasatāmanāptatvena bhāvatvasyaiva prāpterityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4911: (lo, o) ratirityanantaraṃ paripoṣaṃ na nīteti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4917: (vi, ña) saṃcāriṇaḥ pradhānāni ityanena pradhānībhūtasyaiva vyabhicāribhāvasya bhāvatvaprāptiruktā /
GK16visa03cu:4937: anaucityaṃ cātra rasānāṃ bhāratādipraṇītalakṣaṇānāṃ sāmagrīrahitatve ekadeśayogitvopalakṣaṇaparaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:4946: tallakṣaṇākteṃ yat kiñcid sattve ekadeśayogitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4977: evamuttarottaraṃ gataparaṃ kvacit tadviṣayaparaṃ kvacit tadviśiṣṭaparaṃ yogyatayā bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:4980: “svāmī mugdhataro vanaṃ ghanamidaṃ bālāhamekākinī kṣoṇīmāvṛṇute tamālamalinacchāyā tamaḥ santatiḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4983: sahasā vartmeti gopyā giraḥ śrutvā tāṃ parirabhya manmathakalāsakto hariḥ pātu vaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:4986: (vi, ḍha) sandhyākāle panthānamāvṛtya tiṣṭhantaṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ prati gopyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:4990: tathā hi mugdhataro mūḍhataro mama tava āsaṅgaṃ tarkayitumasamarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4993: tatra gurupatnīgatatve yathā--- madhau prabhūte pikanādadūte mandāniloddhūtavikāśicūte /
GK16visa03cu:4995: munipatnīgatatve yathā--- tapovibhāvasaṃbhavātulavibhūtikaḥ saubhari- rmunirnṛpatikanyakāśataparigrahaḥ kāmataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:4996: pracumbati muhurmuhuḥ kucanipīḍamāliṅgati smitottaramudīkṣate parihasatyajastraṃ priyām //
GK16visa03cu:4999: iha hi svāmīti mughdhatara iti ca padābhyāṃ bhayadatvaṃ pakṣe priyatvābhāvo ratināgaratvābhāvaśca,
GK16visa03cu:5002: yauvanena yauvanena ca etādṛśi vayasi anurūpapatirnāsti,
GK16visa03cu:5009: “kāntāsta eva bhuvanatritaye 'pi manye yeṣāṃ kṛte sutanu /
GK16visa03cu:5025: avacitya girau puro niṣaṇṇā svakacānutkacayāñcakāra bhartrā” //
GK16visa03cu:5028: (vi, ta) jaghanasthaleti---kāpi bhillī kirātī jaghanasthale naddhā dhṛtā patravalliḥ patralatā yathā sā tathā /
GK16visa03cu:5029: girimallīkusumāni kuṭajapuṣpāṇi avacitya girau puro niṣaṇṇā satī bhartrā svaprayojyena svakacān arthādavacitakusumaiḥ utkacayāñcakāra uddīptāṃścakāretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5031: atra ca valli ityatra hrasvāntavalliśabdasya rūpam /
GK16visa03cu:5043: cañcadvipañcīkalanādabhaṅgīsaṅgītaṃ cañcantyā vipañcyā vīṇāyāḥ kalanādabhaṅgyā saṅgītam /
GK16visa03cu:5047: “raktotphullaviśālalolanayanaḥ kampottarāṅgo muhur- muktvā karṇamapetabhīrdhṛ tadhanurbāṇo hareḥ paśyataḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5048: ādhmātaḥ kaṭukoktibhiḥ svamasakṛddovikramaṃ kīrtaya- nnaṃsāsphoṭapaṭuryudhiṣṭhiramasau intuṃ praviṣṭor'junaḥ” //
GK16visa03cu:5052: atra ca tāpasasya jīmūtavāhanasya nṛpasya malayavatyāṃ ratau bodhyam /
GK16visa03cu:5054: karṇāt prāptāpamānasya yudhiṣṭhirasya kaṭukoktibhirādhmātaḥ kupitor'junaḥ yudhyamānaṃ karṇaṃ tyaktvā yudhiṣṭhiraṃ hantuṃ pravṛttaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5055: apetabhīrguruhananabhayarahito hareḥ kṛṣṇasya paśyataḥ iti---paśyantaṃ harimanādṛtya ityatrānādare ṣaṣṭhī /
GK16visa03cu:5059: hīnaniṣṭhe śānte gurvādyālambane hāsye brahmavadhādyutsāhe 'dhamapātragate vīre ca nodāhṛtam /
GK16visa03cu:5060: krameṇa yathā caṇḍālayonāviha janma labdhaṃ dvijātijanmāpi na kāṅkṣitaṃ me /
GK16visa03cu:5061: puṇye vane kkāpi vapurvihāsyan punarbhavacchedamahaṃ samīhe // 1 //
GK16visa03cu:5063: adhyāpayatveṣa guruḥ sadā me lālāktavaktro maladigdhavāsāḥ // 2 //
GK16visa03cu:5066: naredraputrān mṛgayā pravṛttān viddhaṃ mṛgaṃ netumupāttavegāḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5067: amī kirātāḥ śarapūrṇacāpā dhāvanti matvā tṛṇavattameva // 4 //
GK16visa03cu:5074: (vi, dha) aśaknuvanniti---kauśiko vāsavo yasyāsurasya sahastraśmeriva darśana soḍhumaśaknuvan bibhyat hemādriguhāṃ praviśya dināni nināya /
GK16visa03cu:5077: tathā hi kauśikaḥ pecakaḥ sahastraraśmerdarśanaṃ soḍhumaśaknuvan adriguhāṃ praviśya yathā dināni nayati,
GK16visa03cu:5079: tathā ca pecaka iva indra ityupamādhvaniḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5083: atra śloke bhayasya sthāyibhāvasya bibhyadiyetadvācyatvāt vyaṅgyatvameva nāsti,
GK16visa03cu:5086: tadudāharaṇaṃ tu jātiduṣṭo 'pi saṃślāghyaḥ sa kālayavano nṛpaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5091: bhāvābhāso lajjādike tu veśyādiviṣaye syāt // VisSd_3.266 //
GK16visa03cu:5095: veśyādiniṣṭhe yathā--- līlānamramukhī śiroṃ'śukamavākṛṣyānayantī puro netropāntavilokanena parito yūnāṃ dhayantī manaḥ /
GK16visa03cu:5097: kasyāpi puṇyātmanaḥ puṇyaughaṃ paripākamāśamayituṃ līlottaraṃ gacchati //
GK16visa03cu:5110: bhāvasya śāntirudayaḥ saṃdhiḥ śabalatā matā // VisSd_3.267 //
GK16visa03cu:5112: “sutanu / jahihi kopaṃ paśya pādānataṃ māṃ na khalu tava kadācitkopa evaṃvidho 'bhūt /
GK16visa03cu:5113: iti nigadati nāthe tiryagāmīlitākṣyā nayanajalamanalpaṃ muktamuktaṃ na kiñcit” //
GK16visa03cu:5116: vrajati ramaṇo niḥ śvasyoccau stanasthitahastayā nayanasalilacchannā dṛṣṭiḥ sakhīṣu niveśitā” //
GK16visa03cu:5126: rūpamidaṃ madirākṣyā madayati hṛdayaṃ dunoti came” //
GK16visa03cu:5137: (vi, ba) kvākāryyamiti---urvaśīvirahe maraṇe pravṛtya nivṛttasya purūravasa uktiriyam /
GK16visa03cu:5150: iti sāhityadarpaṇe rasādinirūpaṇo nāma tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ /
